entry.name: ifvtex
entry.caption: Detects use of VTeX and its facilities.
entry.description:
The package looks for VTeX and sets the switch \ifvtex. In the presence of VTeX, the mode switches \ifvtexdvi, \ifvtexpdf and \ifvtexps are set; \ifvtexgex tells you whether GeX is operating.
The package is part of the oberdiek bundle.
